Subject: Re: Recovering Rodimus/BlackFortress
X-Yahoo-Group-Post: member; u=180614363; y=YkZN3QWkurMslf5zGLZLy7_nj_D_Rm8I5cUtwwv9KGGnv1QQtFw4jw

The battle was not what it seemed . . . 
=A0
The punch Rodimus had thrown, =
the one that was so easily blocked by Tuscon, would have shocked Rodimus ha=
d it landed. He would have been glad to be rid of this annoyance, yes, but =
it would have been somewhat disappointing as well. 
=A0
So when Rodimus was=
 spun around by Tuscon, the Autobot may have missed the wicked smile on his=
 face, When Tuscon tried to=A0ram Rodimus into a wall, he may not have noti=
ced that the sound of crunching metal was not=A0Rodimus' but the reinrorced=
 wall shearing and tearing under the force of the assault. It was not the s=
ound of=A0Rodimkus' defeat that resonated through the room, but it was some=
thing else!
=A0
Many of the same teachers that had instructed Tuscon had tr=
ained a young Hot Rod as well -=A0=A0Jazz, Prowl, Brawn, Kup, even Optimus =
himself! And while Rodimus no longer clearly remembered all these ones and =
what they had meant to him, thier lessons were still ground into him, and h=
is reflexes that had been honed over the years of battle! 
=A0
Also, this w=
as no young Hot Rod that stood there before them, but a figure shapped by t=
he energy of the matrix into a character of leadership, power and ability. =
He no longer had access to the knowledge and wisdom of the matrix, the ener=
gy having been stripped from him. But that power that had been imparted was=
 still there, reconfigured by the power of the predacon shell program!=A0He=
 was faster, stronger and far more durable then Hot Rod ever was,=A0he was=
=A0DARK RODIMUS!
=A0
So when Rodimus hit the wall it was not truely pain th=
at he felt, but the elation that a true battle was in the making. He felt t=
hat charge that all warriors felt when they faced a foe that had some metal=
! It was an eagerness twisted by Predacon programming into something dark a=
nd loathsome. 
=A0
So when he stood and turned around it was not defeat in =
his stance but derision, "So you fancy yourself to be a Prime do you, scrap=
pling?" Rodimus said=A0his tone still mocking as he raised his arm,=A0smili=
ng as his optics glowing with energy, "Well let's see what you got!" With a=
 thought he fired a blast of plasma energy from his arm mounted cannon at t=
his new incarnation of Tuscon, who for the moment appeared to be posturing =
for Hydras!
=A0
OOC: Remember, the matrix that is housed within Rodimus has=
 no energy of its own, only the housing. It does not have the power to reac=
h out and transform anyone, although I do have some ideas. I am not sure if=
 you want to redo your post, or let it go as it stands. 
=A0
Preston
(Cyclo=
nus/Scourge/Dark rodimus)
